channel.title: What the fuck?
channel.description:
Well, I was making a RS account and I found a piece of capitalized text in the user agreement wich wasnt there the last time I checked, so I read it...
OUR LIABILITY / YOUR INDEMNITY THIS SECTION (AND ANY OTHER CLAUSE EXCLUDING OR RESTRICTING OUR LIABILITY) APPLIES TO OUR DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, SUBCONTRACTORS, AGENTS AND AFFILIATED COMPANIES AS WELL AS TO US. [b]NOTHING IN THIS AGREEMENT IN ANY WAY LIMITS OR EXCLUDES OUR LIABILITY FOR NEGLIGENCE CAUSING DEATH OR PERSONAL INJURY OR FOR FRAUDULENT MISREPRESENTATION OR FOR ANY LIABILITY WHICH MAY NOT LEGALLY BE EXCLUDED OR LIMITED.[/b] EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS, TO THE EXTENT ALLOWED BY APPLICABLE LAW WE EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM ANY REPRESENTATIONS, WARRANTIES, CONDITIONS OR OTHER TERMS, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, BY STATUTE, COLLATERALLY OR OTHERWISE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES, CONDITIONS OR OTHER TERMS OF SATISFACTORY QUALITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR REASONABLE CARE AND SKILL. TO THE EXTENT ALLOWED BY APPLICABLE LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE IN CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUING NEGLIGENCE), STATUTORY DUTY OR COLLATERALLY OR OTHERWISE ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OR THIS WEBSITE FOR CONSEQUENTIAL, INDIRECT OR SPECIAL LOSS OR DAMAGE OR ANY ECONOMIC LOSSES (INCLUDING LOSS OF REVENUES, PROFITS, CONTRACTS, BUSINESS OR ANTICIPATED SAVINGS) OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES OR LOSS OF DATA, IN EACH CASE, EVEN IF WE HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH LOSS OR DAMAGE AND HOWSOEVER INCURRED. OUR MAXIMUM LIABILITY TO YOU IN CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), STATUTORY DUTY OR COLLATERALLY OR OTHERWISE ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OR THIS WEBSITE SHALL BE LIMITED TO £50, OR THE SUMS PAID BY YOU TO US IN RESPECT OF ANY TWELVE MONTH PERIOD, WHICHEVER IS GREATER. ALL CLAIMS MUST BE SUBMITTED IN WRITING AND BROUGHT WITHIN THREE MONTHS OF THEIR OCCURRENCE OR WAIVED. YOU HEREBY AGREE TO INDEMNIFY JAGEX AND HOLD US HARMLESS FROM AND AGAINST ALL THIRD PARTY LIABILITIES, CLAIMS, LOSSES, DAMAGES, OR COSTS ARISING FROM YOUR BREACH OF THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS INCLUDING REASONABLE LAWYERS' FEES AND COSTS.

item.title: What the fuck?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:24, topic:37936”][quote author=DeadBird link=topic=53621.msg662787#msg662787 date=1166752275]
A guy killed someone else in Korea over WoW because he killed him and he lost his stuff or something.
Its sad and funny at the same time on how obsessed people get over games.
[/quote]

why you gota lie?? you don’t lose shit when you die on WoW…[/quote]
I wasn’t sure, notice the “or something”.
And PaulT corrected me, it was Lineage 2.

Read full topic

item.title: What the fuck?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Ive also heard about a chinese guy who played a few days straight without eating/drinking/toilet breaks and died eventually. Now that is pathetic.

Well, not really pathetic. The Chinese work on 12+ accounts at the same time in modified yew chopping clients, in small gold farming complexes where they live and sleep. They make very little money, most of the profit goes to the person running the farm. The dude probably worked himself to death to feed his family (or buy meth). Not pathetic, awesome!

Go capitalism!

Go socialism!

Socialism uses “Slave Labor”…

It’s super effective!

A guy killed someone else in Korea over WoW because he killed him and he lost his stuff or something. Its sad and funny at the same time on how obsessed people get over games.

Actually the game he played was Lineage, which is the most popular game in South Korea (or maybe there was a World of Warcrack death too, I don’t know).

Read full topic

item.title: What the fuck?
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

PaulT:

[quote=RIP RSC]So I think someone died playing runescape and his/her family complained about it.

Also, in poor communities where many kids play RS at the library, gangs of older youths sometimes grab the kids who were playing Runescape off the street outside the library. They beat the shit out of them untill they get the username and password, then sell the goods on ebay and buy crack cocaine.[/quote]

That’s what they get for being stupid enough to play RS

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

PaulT:

[quote=Unnamed]I saw a guy like 27 playing rs in a library.

The lone twenty something year old Runescape player…The saddest demographic of human beings in the world today. Living off of Ramen noodles and light cigarettes, most often found in the natural habitat of their parents basement. It may have an aversion to natural sunlight which you can use to your advantage. [/quote]

[me=The Un-Named]wonders if they have an aversion to false sun light.[/me]

Welcome back, PaulT.

OUR LIABILITY / YOUR INDEMNITY THIS SECTION (AND ANY OTHER CLAUSE EXCLUDING OR RESTRICTING OUR LIABILITY) APPLIES TO OUR DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, SUBCONTRACTORS, AGENTS AND AFFILIATED COMPANIES AS WELL AS TO US.
